title: Flipped Learning-Based Realistic Mathematics Education: Foundational Math Competency Enhancement for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operation skills at a third-grade elementary school level
context.additional_context: A corporate training program focusing on cultivating mathematical application skills for solving everyday workplace problems

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model real-world problems encountered in workplace settings
Learners can solve work-related spatial problems by applying trigonometric and vector concepts
Learners demonstrate collaborative thinking with peers in solving math problems that reflect cultural backgrounds

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
